title: Cannot launch client
body:
Attempting to launch client normally and admin mode gives a system error. "Cannot start because C://WINDOWS/WinSxS/x86_microsoft.vc80.crt_1fc8b3b9a1e18e3b_8.0.50727.9268_none_d08e1538442a243e\MSVCR80.dll is missing from computer."

I've reinstalled, used the Hextech repair tool, uninstalled C++, reinstalled latest versions of C++, updated Windows. I'm at a loss

Running Windows 10 with direct x 9

Anyone know how I can fix this error? Thanks!

replies.body: Fixed it. If anyone else is having a similar problem, Windows updates failed. Deleting or renaming the hidden "$WINDOWS.~BT" folder in my C:// drive followed by using Windows Upgrade Assistant tool.
I gave the game permissions and it appears there are corrupt files in my drive. But all the fixes I'm trying are failing.

It sounds like either a file for your OS might be missing or doesn't have permissions to access it.  You've done a lot of steps already that I thought of, but I also suggest the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  This will make sure that nothing is blocking the game from accessing files.  Let me know if that helps!
